features: This exquisite haaram features a delicate design with alternating diamond clusters and open, geometric shapes. The diamond clusters are prong-set, maximizing their brilliance. The use of rose gold provides a warm contrast and modern aesthetic. The 'dangling' diamond sections add a touch of playful movement.

description: Experience the allure of handcrafted elegance with this diamond haaram. The impeccable craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds, and durable Hyderabadi polish ensure that this piece will be treasured for generations. Its versatile design makes it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection, adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit.
